html:
shall bring., Not into the Church, but back to the Holy Land.

an offering,= a gift offering. Hebrew. minchah., App-43.

swift beasts:, carriages, as required by the Structure of Isaiah 66:20 : q | horses.
, x | in chariots and litters.
, q | upon mules.
, r | in carriages.
, "Swift beasts", is Hebrew. kirkaroth, from karar,, to move in a circle; hence, may mean (like English car), any vehicle on wheels. It is never used of animals. There is nothing to suggest ", swaying furnaces", as suggested by some, to mean "locomotives".

holy., See note On Exodus 3:5.

as,= according as.

bring an offering, &c., Reference to Pentateuch (Lev 2, &c.) App-92.
